website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive set at a price that won't break your budget.
pros: Comes with an impressive variety of slotted and Phillips-head screwdrivers for a budget price
17 different sizes to fit most jobs
Stands out for Craftsman's renowned lifetime replacement warranty
cons: The quality may be a bit lower than Craftsman tools of the past, but the warranty helps make up for this issue

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description, Made in China not Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on description saying Made in USA. Package says Made in China. I decided to check but there was a sticker conveniently placed over the made in area. Removed part of sticker and says Made in China. Would be zero stars for misleading me if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Weiners and Wine

customer_reviews.title: Not the Craftsman of old
customer_reviews.text: Two of these broke the first time I used them. The shank started spinning in the handle on one and the tip split in half on another both under relatively little torque. I have similar looking Craftsman tools that have lasted 30 years, but these appear to be stage props.
customer_reviews.author: FC Willie

customer_reviews.title: l am no happy.
customer_reviews.text: They are not made in the USA , they are Chinese made. False advertising tising .l am no happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, not what the description says
customer_reviews.text: I am not surprised for the price, but these are made in China. Description says "The Craftsman 17 pc. Screwdriver Set is made in USA by a name you trust." Stuff made in China is not always bad, but the incorrect desciption makes it suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Lee McCrocklin

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good set but poor quality control makes me wonder if the Craftsman brand is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for this a few days ago and the order was fulfilled by Ascend Ecommerce. Unfortunately, the set of screwdrivers I received had a manufacturing defect; one of the slotted (i.e., flat-head) screwdrivers wasn't machined at the factory and was just a 1/4" square tip. Sears quality control clearly isn't what it used to be. If I'm going to get crappy tools, I might as well get the same set from HFT for $7! Also, I checked and my local Sears sells this set for $27.99 as opposed to the $37.95 on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Neil C

customer_reviews.title: WINNER FOR 40+ YEARS
customer_reviews.text: My 1970's set of Craftsman screwdrivers was in a toolbox that was stolen recently. Was glad all the sizes still in one nice package for me to replace. The others had served me well for 40+ years of prying, pounding, and even putting in or tightening various screws in all manner of places or hard to reach locations. From stubby ones to the long reach ones, the set covers all my needs. Well marked, well made, color coded, easy to hold and use so why try to fix something that is not broken. Excellent deal to this day from Craftsman and good price on Amazon to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Burney Cain

customer_reviews.title: Broken screwdriver in package
customer_reviews.text: The longest screwdriver in the package was broken before we opened it. Someone in quality control didn’t do their job, because it was not a clear, sharp break. It was actually smoothed over - like it broke part way through the manufacturing process and they still coated and packaged it. I would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Tools Are No Longer USA Made - Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely displeased that I recieved a Craftsman screw driver set of inferior Chinese manufacture. I was hoping to obtain earlier produced, Western Forge, USA made Craftsman screw drivers. These are not the Craftsman screwdrivers my grandfather used; these are not the screwdrivers my father used; these are not the screwdrivers I grew up using. America first; American manufacture; America self-sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchy moma with 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Not USA made!
customer_reviews.text: I would appreciate my money back. Not as advertised. I am learning quickly that amazon is not the place where real mechanics should be shopping. Very disappointed with amazon for misleading. Craftsman will not have any of my business again. I'm hoping others feel the same about Amazon putting cheap import tools over quality homegrown. I am not going to waste my time on walking these to the mail box to return. And Merry Christmas to all.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Made in America
customer_reviews.text: I remember my father having a set of these when I was a kid and he regularly abused them and used then as chisels, drifts, or turn it right side up and use the handle as a hammer. They lasted forever, and so when it became time to buy my own set of screwdrivers, the choice was very easy to make. I love that these are still made in America, and that they don't feel like they're made cheaper or with any less care. Great job Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Tichelaar

customer_reviews.title: I think it's kind of funny. Obviously some random manufacturing error
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver pictured at top right in this product picture (the small straight with a pocket clip) arrived with no finished tip on it at all -- the square shaft just continues to the tip and then ends. I think it's kind of funny. Obviously some random manufacturing error. But it does make one wonder about the quality overall. So far (other than the above) I have no complaints (except that I now have way too many screwdrivers - ;) ).
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoar

customer_reviews.title: Great for light use
customer_reviews.text: Luckily these are Craftsman and Sears will replace them no questions asked. I had to exchange quite a few of these at Sears within the first couple of months of purchase as the regular bits would twist easily. Granted I was using them to remove old rusted screws. Overall a good set and would be great for light use and everyday needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for my husband for Christmas because he kept complaining that we needed a screwdriver. We actually needed it sooner then Christmas (who knew) and when I gave them to him, he was thrilled. Definitely a great addition to any tool collection or to begin with. Also great for those husbands that keep complaining they need a screwdriver!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie & Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not what Craftsman was, but okay
customer_reviews.text: These are still decent drivers. However looking at some of my fathers Craftsman drivers from the 80's I can tell these do not have the quality control they once did. Another thing is the shaft that extends into the resin driver handle is not nearly as well secured as in the old drivers. The little T protrusion that prevents spinning the handle is not even half the size of the older models. I'm sure with enough torque you can spin the handle right off, just be cautious and know its possible.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Perry

customer_reviews.title: ... stuff these are made in china how deceptive just like ebay sent them
customer_reviews.text: Just threw out all my china screw drivers do not want any chins stuff these are made in china how deceptive just like ebay sent them back
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: These are not made in the USA as the description says. The package says made in China. They might be quality screwdrivers but it's not what I was looking for so I'm returning them. I'm giving three stars because I feel it's not fair to give them a lower rating without actually trying them.
customer_reviews.author: GrubbyToucan

customer_reviews.title: Lies! Chinese made crap
customer_reviews.text: Lies! Product is Not made in USA, its overpriced Chinese slave labor, environment killing crap.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamless

customer_reviews.title: Well made, mostly
customer_reviews.text: I like Craftsman tools, they're generally well made. What I dislike is the substitution of real tools with toys to make up their set #'s.. this set included 3 'toys' as tools. I knew they were there, but not sure why the new owning company continues this poor tradition. Like everything at Sears, and why they're no-more, is because they had gotten very sleezy over the years in everything they did.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Zittritsch

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: It works, its garunteed by craftsman, but ITS NOT MADE in USA! I read the q &a and reviews that stated its still made usa, but its not or maybe its the set i got. I get a feeling everything is made off shore these days. 2 star deduct for made in china
customer_reviews.author: GANBATEKUDASAI

customer_reviews.title: Good set. Why not.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set and lifetime warranty as long as you dont use them for a pry bar or chisel. Note to everyone, buy pry bar and chisel set. Also, unless you have been living under a rock, you'll know these haven't been made in the U.S. for a looooooong time. Get over it. They're screwdrivers
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Varity and quality.. these are both
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman has been around for a long time and they still hold the quality. The grip is good, but in this set the varity is especially good. The mix of the different types is perfect. Highly recommend. The also can be magnetized with the swipe of a magnet.
customer_reviews.author: PTVEGAS

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Description says made in USA, but they are not. I will be returning them for tools made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Classic Craftsman Tool...
customer_reviews.text: Classic Craftsman screwdriver set. This set was just what I needed to fill out my tool chest. It has both phillips and flat head screw drivers in all sizes for almost any job. I've gotten use out of the smallest size all the way up to the largest. Plus, with that Craftsman lifetime warranty, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman has changed.
customer_reviews.text: What happen to the Craftsman quality?? This crap is made in China!! What a joke. The tips are weak and easily break. Try getting it replaced. More cheap junk coming from China.
customer_reviews.author: Marc P.

customer_reviews.title: Old Color Scheme
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and you're purchasing all Craftsman tools with the new color scheme that Stanley Black & Decker has been using (the bright red, black and grey since they acquired Craftsman from Sears), you might want to be aware that these screwdrivers are using the old color scheme from the Sears days. They're classic, and work just fine, but if you are trying to develop a matching tool set, this will not match the new color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: It’s me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, full set of Screwdrivers. Unfortunately for us, we seem to lose them... a lot. So, I end up having to buy more. But I DO buy more because they are good quality and they work very well. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety of lengths. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these occasionally around the house for various odd jobs the past few months and they work great. Solid construction. None of them feel loose, but I'm also not using them with a lot of torque. I have power tools for that stuff, so for the easy screws they work great. Nice set for the price. Love the variety of lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Wickes

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman big boy tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and At 65 plus years old it is time to put away my Harbor Freight screw driver set, which have served me well for many years and get a set of big boy Craftsman tools.
customer_reviews.author: Master Ed

customer_reviews.title: A great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Have not had an issue with these yet. They seem to be strong and have good points on them. I really enjoy the handle and how well they fit in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: THe Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Great product with good manufacturer warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad for Father's day. They were packaged in one big plastic wrapping (not a case). My dad has a tool box so I wasn't worried about the lack of case for them. He loves this set! He uses them daily and generally goes through screwdrivers pretty fast in his line of work, but these have held up. Also, the Craftsman lifetime warranty makes this product worth it because if one does break/chip he knows he can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tabithia

customer_reviews.title: Every screwdriver I ever needed (except precision)
customer_reviews.text: Except for small electronics, these screwdrivers will get you in and out of anything ever. They are high quality with a decent grip and a perfect variety of size from pretty darn small to miniature prybar. Sears sells a 13 screwdriver holder that is pretty much meant for this set and except the smallest ones and a couple of the medium size ones, it holds most of them and keeps them well organized. Great buy and you get the Sears guarantee so that's a plus. The only other screwdriver I would buy is a ratcheting one to lessen fatigue during big projects.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin H. Mossberg

customer_reviews.title: Sears craftsman 17 piece screw drivers set.
customer_reviews.text: Worn a set of these out. Not bad getting 10 years of service out of them. Still have Sears tools I bought in the 1970s. I really don't care to have any other brand. They work hard.
customer_reviews.author: PC Scooter

customer_reviews.title: An old dependable
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the original tools that come with a life-long replacement from Sears, these are still good screwdrivers. I had a need for some additional drivers so I chose these knowing their past usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Everything arrived in good shape. No visible defects in the metal/tips. I've used a few of them already and no bending or twisting occured. Personally, I wish there were more tip types but I'm not unhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ditto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Screwdriver Set!
customer_reviews.text: Having owned many many Craftsman tools throughout the years I've probably owned this set as separates for some time now. Other than these being screwdrivers and not being anything fancy or exotic here's the rundown on these; Pros; Excellent build quality. Both the plastic and metal Color coded Philips are Red. Strait are Clear, nice touch! Craftsman Warranty! Great selection Cons; Few come to mind? Price perhaps? But these are quite reasonable when compared to other sets.
customer_reviews.author: makoman50

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a bunch of mismatched screwdrivers that made it difficult to quickly find the one I needed. I got rid of them all and purchased this Craftsmen set. The color coordination (red and blue for standard, blue for Phillips) makes it easy to quickly find the one you need.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Foo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: After buying cheap Harbor Freight tools in my younger years I have since started to acquire good Craftsman tools and really wish I would have been doing so all along. I cant count how many cheap screwdrivers I have broken, granted I am often using them in ways they are not intended such as using to pry on something. I am happy to say I have yet to break a single one of these. They are Craftsman so I m not 100% but if they are like the sockets and wrenches, you just take them into sears and they will replace any broken tools without a receipt.
customer_reviews.author: WolfHunter1043

customer_reviews.title: Excellent American Made Screwdrivers!
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers are great, and the set I received was made in the USA. I purchased this set through Amazon Warehouse Deals where I saved $14.00 on the $31.25 price listed on Amazon as of 10/13/2014. I purchased these as a set because most of my collection of screwdrivers is piece meal leftovers from sets where pieces have been broken, stolen, lost, or just plain worn out and no longer serviceable. I suspect these screwdrivers will outlast me, but if not, Craftsman has a lifetime replacement guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: It Craftsman tools lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great price for Craftsman screwdrivers. Lifetime warranty. What more do I need to say. When you hear Craftsman tools you know when you buy them you have them for life.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy ownby

customer_reviews.title: small diameter handles
customer_reviews.text: These are small. The diameter of the handles. Makes it hard to grip well enough to develop adequate torque. Also, despite the large assortment, there are duplicates in tip size (just longer/shorter) while some sizes you would expect are missing.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY Screwdriver Set
customer_reviews.text: I've started to build my DIY toolbox and these should last me the rest of my life, hopefully... It has Craftsman lifetime warranty so if they do break I have that option. I used it a few times already and they seem to work just fine. Overall I am really happy, I can now fix all the loose screws around the house FINALLY!
customer_reviews.author: eight1178

customer_reviews.title: Like the old stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, keep in house, garage, toolbox. Made in chine, but who cares... so is everything else!!
customer_reviews.author: SLED

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy these again. This one broke on the first use and one of the Phillips have broke in have(don't have picture threw it out). If you do a lot of rebuilds find something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fairly strong. Will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money to buy a decent set like this. I got some cheapies last prime day and I’d swear they were made of brass. The ends twisted on first use. These are good and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmen Tools Always Good
customer_reviews.text: I have had Craftsmen over the years but lost some as years go by. These screwdrivers are the best, never broke one only lost them. You cant beat them for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bell

customer_reviews.title: Made in Japan
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product!!!....This sellers items will make your wildest dreams come true
customer_reviews.author: martin janca

customer_reviews.title: Replacement For 40 Year Old Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had bought a similar set from Sears over 40 years ago. They had finally gotten to the point thru Kids taking them to their new homes and use that they needed to be replaced. This time I was smarter and bought my son a set too so he does not have to "Borrow" them. These are "MADE IN THE USA". A very rare thing in today's tool market. I have seen these made and also so called competitors. There is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Keithwsr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman 9131794 Screwdriver Set Craftsman Screw Drivers are the best. I have purchased numerous set for myself and for gifts. This particular set does not include the huge slot and Phillips head screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Several tips have worn out and 3 screw drivers handles just spin. I have not even used these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Can't really review this item as it is a Christmas gift. Knowing Craftsman I know it is a great product and that they stand behind the product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie L. Altom

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas Happy New Years to alleged
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman's always made the best screwdrivers are you recommend them to everybody
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ebinger

customer_reviews.title: not your father's craftsman tools.
customer_reviews.text: most craftsman tools are no longer made in USA but these still are, however the quality isn't the same. went to use one of the larger screwdrivers to tighten a hose clamp and as I got to last twist, the shaft of the screwdriver was rotating in the handle! expected them to last a little longer than one use before encountering issues. now I have to make a trip to the nearest sears (20 miles) to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hufstader

customer_reviews.title: it's important to have good tools around the house in case you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: as a woman, it's important to have good tools around the house in case you need to fix something or impress a future partner with your great hardware
customer_reviews.author: SocialButterflyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought these screwdrivers and I always will. Craftsman screwdrivers have always been awesome, I have had them for 20+ years. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Brenton R.

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose, but they're made in China ...
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose, but they're made in China and they definitely don't feel as high of quality as the same screwdrivers my dad bought 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shifty

customer_reviews.title: One screwdriver broken
customer_reviews.text: Oops brand new out of the rather difficult packaging to open. It’s a size we don’t need but would have been nice to get a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Houser

customer_reviews.title: Some Cheaper, Some way more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: typical craftsman screwdriver set. which is what i wanted. as long as they aren’t used as a hammer, or pry bar, expect then to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: themav

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He liked them. They are heavy duty and nicely made. Who doesn't love craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Launi

customer_reviews.title: poor quality china made tool
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these expecting to get quality Craftsman screw drivers. i was disappointed to see them made in china. but no big deal. then i opened them and realized they are inferior to the the low grade harbor freight screw drivers. honestly my last craftsman purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: sean adams

customer_reviews.title: Classic Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Love theses tools, my dad has the same set for years. I’d help him with the cars and he uses these to this day. That was almost 40 yrs ago. I have not had to use them yet, however I’m sure my husband will love them!
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA H

customer_reviews.title: Just like dad's old screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, these are just like dad's screwdrivers he had while growing up. He still has them actually. Handles have some kind of coating on them but a quick wipe and its good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larue

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I carefully checked the description of this item to ensure it wasn't made in China. The description clearly says made in USA, but when I received the screwdrivers the package says made in China. I'd have happily payed more money for a set made in USA or Europe if the description had been accurate.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Crapmans newest line of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage...I used a flat head screw stick to take apart a chain saw and tip broke off the screwdricer first use. I wasnt prying I was actually taking a screw out. Go figure use a tool for what its made and it breaks. Garbage.. Craftsman's living up to the Crapman name. Harbor freight puts these to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Screwdriver set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Craftsman screwdriver set to replace my existing Craftsman set that was 30 years old. I am very happy with the product and it’s delivery
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Item description is exactly what it says. Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Tredneck

customer_reviews.title: One of the few affordable USA made sets of tools ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the few affordable USA made sets of tools left. Do yourself a favor and add these to your toolbox while theyre still available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazin Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not whatb we used to get
customer_reviews.text: They are decent screwdrivers, but not the quality that sears used to produce.
customer_reviews.author: obars

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set of Craftsman tools for my son, getting into home and auto repair at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Ive used then while working on my car and they hold up to rough handling as well as staying easily manipulated even while greasy
customer_reviews.text: Quality screw drivers. Ive used then while working on my car and they hold up to rough handling as well as staying easily manipulated even while greasy/oily. Only fault, packaging came damaged and most were scattered throughout the box they were shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: I do not buy any other screwdrivers Great set of tools
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good screwdriver set.
customer_reviews.text: Classic screwdriver set, nothing fancy but excellent for the price. Good choice for DIY or casual user.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is great, has most of the lengths and types needed for daily use. Just wish the shafts were a little thicker, the longer drivers tend to flex.
customer_reviews.author: Errol K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman says it all. I have been using Craftsman for over 50 years. Maybe not as good as Snap On. I do not know. I have never been able to afford Snap On. I have used Craftsman all of my life. Yes I have worn some out. But I have always exchanged for new, or felt like I got my money worth. So up now I know when I buy Craftsman I'm ok. Hope that does not change. Metal Man Ted
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Saving money with Amazon. Quality tools for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Campeau-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good service  , American made
customer_reviews.text: Being in the building trade for over 50 years good American tools are a prerequisite Craftsmanship lifetime warranty on hand tools is an industry standard This company delivered my order in less than 24 hours. Quidos
customer_reviews.author: Francine Kim Moceri

customer_reviews.title: You need these.
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of top of the line screwdrivers. Fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good set
customer_reviews.text: Replacement set. Had this set for a long time however pices kept being misplaced or gone missing.
customer_reviews.author: dstydingco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend and he is incredibly happy with this set. My dad recommended I get this brand, he is a mechanic and has the same set.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Used heavily every day and has lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a family member who lives in Trinidad & Tobago and he has nothing but great things to say about it. Things like this are grossly overpriced int he Caribbean so he was thrilled to get it. It's been a few months under very heavy use (he is a commercial appliance tech) and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Gina G.

customer_reviews.title: Mans tools
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my fiancé to put in his tool box. He likes them a lot
customer_reviews.author: ALLIE N

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat Crafstman tools
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered works great and a great value
customer_reviews.author: Dean E.

customer_reviews.title: Chinese - NOT "Made in the USA".
customer_reviews.text: Item description specifically says "Made in the USA by a brand you trust". Package says "Made in China". A cheap Chinese screwdriver set like this one is worth half of what your charging for this one. False advertising - Shame on you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman tools is what my husband loves.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves all Craftsman tools he says they are the best brand
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Casey

customer_reviews.title: Still made in the US.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screw drivers, should last a very long time if taken care of. Still say made in the USA unlike the 300 sockets I just bought.
customer_reviews.author: Disco

customer_reviews.title: great product but plastic packing it comes in is EXTREMELY ...
customer_reviews.text: great product but plastic packing it comes in is EXTREMELY hard to open and offers many opportunities to cut oneself also the packaging looked like it was slit open on top right corner and one screwdriver was missing (see white empty spot in photo)
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The stubby Phillips screwdriver came without the shaft! A handle is all I got.
customer_reviews.author: rickhz

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers are a great value and say that they are still made in the USA!! I bought this exact set 20 years ago and over the years have lost approximately half so i decided to reorder and i am very happy i did.
customer_reviews.author: Skleathers

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Much needed addition to my tool box. Typical solid Craftsman quality.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: No problems here !!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son who is starting to obtain tools for car repairs. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: Not Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the Craftsman brand not made in American despite what the description says. Still a good quality tool, but package clearly says made in China. I'll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Pollara

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as part of my husband’s Christmas gift. He asked for this brand and a general starter kit with basic screwdriver tools. This is the set.
customer_reviews.author: ORclimber

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great set of screw drivers if the largest #2 phillip was actually milled. It came out of the package with slots not milled into the tip. Made in the USA, which is great, but the quality control is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Craftsman tools have served me well, and the screwdrivers are of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nolfe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and not magnetic. Equivalent can be purchased at Home Depot of Costco. They’re all made in China anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Craftsman tools. This is a nice traditional set with a decent range of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Love Craftsman tools. This is a nice traditional set with a decent range of sizes. The tips feel very strong and snug. Two complaints. A carrying case would have been nice, even if it was more expensive. Also, as others have expressed, cut the fluff and call it a 16-piece set. Who cares about a craftsman dog tag???
customer_reviews.author: Askani

customer_reviews.title: Our son-in-law was very happy with this Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Our son-in-law was very happy with this Christmas present. He couldn't find his one screw driver just before Christmas so he put it on his wish list and was real happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Olson

customer_reviews.title: Happy in America
customer_reviews.text: When was the last time you got screwdrivers that actually say "made in America" on each and every driver? We are happy, and I have already used "mine" for my stretchers in art. Worked great and I love it is labeled...I think I can use it the rest of my live and throw the piece of crap I had been using! Yayyyy!
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: ... but these screw drivers are even lower quality than crappy no-name multi-tools
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for but these screw drivers are even lower quality than crappy no-name multi-tools!
customer_reviews.author: siamak

customer_reviews.title: don't buy these. Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: . These are terrible. I've broken every tip on everyone I've used....thats sad man.
customer_reviews.author: Jake brigner

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack for myself and a pack for my father for his birthday
customer_reviews.author: Chile a Mor

product_meta.title: Craftsman 9-31794 Slotted Phillips Screwdriver Set, 17 Piece
product_meta.description: Craftsman 17 pc. Screwdriver Set: Essential for Any Small Toolkit If you've decided it's time to get serious about your toolkit, this Craftsman Clear Handle Screwdriver Set is a great way to go about it. Featuring professional quality slotted and Phillips screwdrivers, this 17 piece set comes with enough sizes to handle many standard jobs where you need to tighten or loosen screws. The durable, butyrate handles are designed for high strength. They'll feel balanced in your hand, and they're durable enough to take a beating. The Craftsman 17 pc. Screwdriver Set is made in USA by a name you trust. Each blade is heat-treated and designed for getting the job done right every time. The slotted blade tips provide excellent screw holding, while the Phillips blade tips provide tight tolerance and a snug fit.
feature_bullets: Includes 7 Philips screwdrivers: #0 x 1 1/2", #0 x 2 1/2", #1 x 1 1/2", #1 x 3", #2 x 4", #2 x 6", #2 x 8"

specifications.Included Components: 17 Piece, 9- Slotted Screwdrivers, Craftsman 9-31794 Slotted Phillips Screwdriver Set, 7- Philips Screwdrivers, 4 In 1 Pocket Keychain
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,269 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
